name: 李瑞元
objective: 本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉還路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
schedule:
Weeks 1-2: Introduction to Process Control
Week 3: Theoretical Models of Chemical Processes
Week 4: Laplace Transforms
Week 5: Transfer Function Models
Week 6-7: Dynamic Behaviour of 1st- and 2nd-order Processes
Week 8: Dynamic Response Characteristics of More Complicated Processes
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Week 10: Development of Empirical Models from Process Data
Week 11: Feedback Controllers
Week 12: Control System Instrumentation
Week 13-14: Dynamic Behaviour and Stability of Closed-loop Control Systems
Week 15-16: PID Controller Design, Tuning and Troubleshooting
Week 17: Control strategies at Process Unit Level
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Dale E Seborg, Duncan A Mellichamp, Francis J Doyle III, Thomas F Edgar. Process Dynamics and Control Techniques, 4th Edition. John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 2017.
remarks: 因應疫情防疫規定，可能調整教學方式為遠距教學、使用 MS Teams、教師聯絡方式 juiyuan@ntut.edu.tw。
